trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control and two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> controls that are used to set a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la primitiva del controllo che gestisce il posizionamento e il ridimensionando del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> e dei due controlli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />, utilizzati per impostare <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo non dispone di un valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> viene implementato come parte di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> ha un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controllo e due <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> i controlli che vengono utilizzati per modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> on a slider.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> sul dispositivo di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider**
trans-unit.target: **Una traccia in un dispositivo di scorrimento**

trans-unit.source: ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb")
trans-unit.target: ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb")

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente mostra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> proprietà e i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> proprietà che vengono automaticamente associate.

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Quando delle proprietà viene modificato, cambia anche la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> proprietà e i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> proprietà a cui vengono associate quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> proprietà non sono impostate in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> proprietà e i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> proprietà a cui vengono associate quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> proprietà non sono impostate in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> le proprietà per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controlla per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo viene associato al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> le proprietà per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> dei controlli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> viene utilizzato per scorrere il contenuto, le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo è proporzionale alla percentuale del contenuto che viene visualizzato nell'area visualizzabile o viewport.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente viene illustrato un esempio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> controllo che implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo.

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control**
trans-unit.target: **Una barra di scorrimento che include un controllo di traccia**

trans-unit.source: ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Illustrazione di ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "di ScrollBar")

trans-unit.source: The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il calcolo seguente viene utilizzato per calcolare le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength
trans-unit.target: Percorso = trackLength × (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))

trans-unit.source: The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro viewportSize rappresenta il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: I parametri minimi e massimi corrispondono al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'espressione massimo, minimo + viewportSize è la dimensione del contenuto scorrevole.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> proprietà rappresenta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> quando il contenuto scorre verso il basso.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valore non è uguale alla lunghezza o l'estensione del contenuto.

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> aumenta dall'alto verso il basso o da sinistra a destra in base all'orientamento del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> aumenta dal basso verso l'alto o da sinistra a destra in base all'orientamento del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare la direzione dei valori crescenti, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come definire un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Area fornita per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea il layout per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> content.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> da utilizzare per il contenuto del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that decreases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> che riduce la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that reduces the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> che riduce il valore <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> quando viene premuto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato predefinito è un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> con impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo è in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> (controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> dei controlli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> associare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> gli stili vengono definiti all'interno del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> modello di controllo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see the [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Per l'esempio completo, vedere il [stili e modelli ScrollBar](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: Indice del figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il figlio del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nell'elenco degli elementi figlio della visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: L'indice deve essere un numero tra zero (0) e il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> meno uno (1).

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Specificare gli elementi figlio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio vengono indicizzati nell'ordine in cui vengono impostate le proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: L'indice specificato è maggiore rispetto al valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> meno uno (1).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> che aumenta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />, che aumenta la <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> quando viene premuto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato predefinito è un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> con impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo è in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> (controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> dei controlli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> associare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> gli stili vengono definiti all'interno del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> modello di controllo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se la direzione dell'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> viene o meno invertita rispetto alla direzione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> si sono scambiate di posizione e se viene invertita la direzione del valore crescente; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> è impostato su `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> posizioni di exchange.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> i valori aumentano da sinistra a destra per entrambi orizzontale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controlli.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> valori per un oggetto verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> aumentano dall'alto verso il basso, mentre per un oggetto verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> aumentano di questi valori dal basso verso l'alto.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> proprietà `true`, inverte la direzione dell'aumento del valore.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo e non imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene associata al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> proprietà è definita all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> modello di controllo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il massimo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The largest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Il più grande <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> possibile per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo si trova in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà non è impostata in modo esplicito, questa proprietà viene associata automaticamente con il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valore per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo equivale alla dimensione del contenuto scorrevole meno le dimensioni dell'area di contenuto visibile o viewport.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se le dimensioni del contenuto sono 100 e la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà è 30, il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> proprietà è impostato su 70.

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene perché il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo corrisponde alla posizione del contenuto scorrevole che viene visualizzato nella parte superiore del riquadro di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando il contenuto scorre verso il basso molto in questo esempio, il 30% del contenuto viene ancora visualizzato nel riquadro di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> che corrisponde alla parte superiore del riquadro di visualizzazione è 70 e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valore è impostato su 70.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corrisponde a una posizione nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> controllo.

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content")
trans-unit.target: ![Valore corrisponde alla posizione del contenuto](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "valore corrisponde alla posizione del contenuto")

trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> che diventa l'origine di associazione per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the available space for the track.
trans-unit.target: Dimensione dello spazio disponibile per la barra di avanzamento.

trans-unit.source: Measures the layout size that is required for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> and its components.
trans-unit.target: Misura le dimensioni di layout richiesto per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> e i suoi componenti.

trans-unit.source: The layout <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is required by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Dimensione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> del layout che viene richiesta dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il minimo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> possibile del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The smallest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Il più piccolo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> consentito per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo si trova in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà non è impostata in modo esplicito, questa proprietà viene associata automaticamente con il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> che diventa l'origine di associazione per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> viene visualizzato orizzontalmente o verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> enumeration value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Valore dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> che indica se il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> viene visualizzato orizzontalmente o verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo e non imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene associata al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo e non imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene associata al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> utilizzato per modificare il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> che viene utilizzato con il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato predefinito è un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> con impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The placement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: La posizione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo corrisponde alla <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo riflette la quantità di contenuto che è attualmente visibile.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is computed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> viene calcolata nel modo seguente:

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is not specified, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is a fixed default value.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà non è specificata, le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> è un valore fisso predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This is how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> of a Track functions inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il modo in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> di una traccia, le funzioni all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the following formula is used:
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà viene specificata e la dimensione del contenuto è maggiore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, viene utilizzata la formula seguente:

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize)
trans-unit.target: Percorso = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (massimo, minimo + ViewportSize)

trans-unit.source: Where the parameters are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: In cui i parametri sono definiti come segue:

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize
trans-unit.target: Percorso

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in the same units as the TrackLength.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo nelle stesse unità TrackLength.

trans-unit.source: TrackLength
trans-unit.target: TrackLength

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.

trans-unit.source: ViewportSize
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize

trans-unit.source: The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni dell'area di scorrimento che è visibile nelle unità del contenuto, ad esempio il numero di pagine di un documento.

trans-unit.source: Maximum
trans-unit.target: Massimo

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.
trans-unit.target: Il valore massimo del contenuto delle unità del contenuto, ad esempio pagina 10 di un documento di 10 pagine.

trans-unit.source: Minimum
trans-unit.target: Minimo

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.
trans-unit.target: Il valore minimo del contenuto delle unità del contenuto, ad esempio pagina 1 di un documento.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra una rappresentazione visiva di alcuni di questi parametri, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: ![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length")
trans-unit.target: ![Dimensione del viewport e del cursore e lunghezza del percorso](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "dimensione del Viewport e del cursore e lunghezza del percorso")

trans-unit.source: If the size of the content is less than a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> does not appear and the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se le dimensioni del contenuto sono meno di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> non viene visualizzata e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> è impostato su `false`.

trans-unit.source: The minimum sizes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control are determined by two system parameters, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni minime per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo sono determinate da due parametri di sistema, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and the minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La dimensione minima per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo in verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> è 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> e la dimensione minima per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo in orizzontale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> è 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> style is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> lo stile viene definito all'interno del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> as determined by the position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore corrente dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> come determinato dalla posizione del controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore corrente dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> rappresenta un valore compreso tra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà non è impostata in modo esplicito, questa proprietà viene associata automaticamente con il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: Spostamento orizzontale del controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: Spostamento verticale del controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> moves.
trans-unit.target: Calcola la variazione dell'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> quando viene spostato il controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The change in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> that corresponds to the displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Variazione dell'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> che corrisponde allo spostamento del controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: Punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> to a specified point along the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Calcola la distanza dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> al punto specificato lungo il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> and the specified <paramref name="pt" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Distanza tra il controllo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> e il valore <paramref name="pt" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la dimensione della parte del contenuto scorrevole visibile.

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Dimensione dell'area visibile del contenuto scorrevole.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> e significa che la dimensione del contenuto non è definita.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà viene utilizzata per calcolare la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllare in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> non <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la sezione Osservazioni per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per definire in modo esplicito la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, creare un oggetto che deriva dal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> classe e fornisce sostituzioni per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controllo e non imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà viene associata al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controllo che viene implementato in una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controllo è sempre <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, in quanto il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controllo non modifica la dimensione.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di elementi figlio del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Numero intero tra 0 e 2 che specifica il numero di elementi figlio nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Specificare gli elementi figlio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio vengono indicizzati nell'ordine in cui vengono impostate le proprietà.
